name: cnyks
description: Command line introspection tool for nodejs (interactive runner)

scripts.jscs: jscs --config=node_modules/ivs-jssc/ivs-node.jscsrc lib test prompt bin ify.js
scripts.eslint: eslint --config=node_modules/ivs-jssc/ivs-node.eslintrc.js lib test prompt bin ify.js
scripts.checkall: npm run jscs && npm run eslint
scripts.cover: node node_modules/istanbul-alpha-instrument/lib/cli.js cover --dir coverage/master --print none --report none node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -b test/ && node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js  report --include "coverage/**/coverage.raw.json" --dir coverage/html/ text-summary html lcov
scripts.test: npm run checkall && npm run cover

author: Francois Leurent <131.js@cloudyks.org>
